name: Disruptor
title: Thrall
lore: High on the wind plains of Druud, riders know the sky gods favor them. Thrall is the greatest stormcrafter of his tribe.

thunderStrike.name: Thunder Strike
thunderStrike.description: Repeatedly strikes an enemy with lightning, dealing damage and revealing them.

glimpse.name: Glimpse
glimpse.description: Teleports an enemy hero back to where they were a few seconds ago.

kineticField.name: Kinetic Field
kineticField.description: Creates a circular field that prevents enemies from leaving.

staticStorm.name: Static Storm
staticStorm.description: Creates a damaging storm that silences enemies within it. Damage increases over time.

25: Static Storm Grants Disruptor True Sight
